Odcombs complaint: or Coriats funerall epicedium or death-song, vpon his late reported drowning. With his epitaph in the Barmuda, and Utopian tongues. And translated into English by Iohn Taylor. Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
[26] p.
Printed for merrie recreation [by G. Eld], and are to be sold at the salutation in Vtopia [by W. Burre?], [London] : 1613.
Place of publication, printer, and suggested bookseller from STC. In verse. Signatures: A (-A1) B⁶. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
